text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of tryouts arrives, and<n>there's excitement in the air
as<n>trainers gather in hopes of scouting<n>the latest and
greatest in talented<n>Umamusume.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ohoho! A familiar face! It's nice to<n>see you again!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ready? I was BORN ready! No one's<n>raring to go like me,
the class<n>representative!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now then, my race is up next, so I<n>must be off! Just TRY to
keep up with<n>my astonishing speed! But beware...<n>you
might just be blinded by my<n>EXCELLENCE!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin! Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That was Sakura Bakushin O, right?<n>Did she just say she's
in the next<n>race? My data says she specializes<n>in sprints...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
But next up is the long-distance race...<n>What is she
planning?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With furrowed brows, the other<n>curious trainers and I look
on as<n>Sakura Bakushin O's race begins...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Here I go! Bakushin, Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O bursts out of the<n>gates and takes the
lead! She's<n>pulling away from the rest of the<n>runners!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There's more where that came from!<n>Bakushin, Bakushin,
Bakushiiiiin!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Look at her go! With that speed, she<n>might be the fastest
Umamusume on<n>the track today!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Raaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The race has only just begun, and<n>the crowd is going wild!
An unusual<n>reaction to say the least, but after<n>seeing
Sakura Bakushin O, I<n>completely understand.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what is she thinking?! She can't<n>use that much power
right out of the<n>gate! But... then again...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
What amazing speed! I've never<n>seen someone start a
race off like<n>this!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: If she can keep it up...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For a brief moment, even the veteran<n>trainers have their
eyes glued to the<n>track, the prospect of a new racing<n>
superstar filling them with excitement.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The runners are rounding the fourth<n>turn! Their actions from
this point on<n>will decide the outcome of the race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin... Bakushiiin...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
S-Sakura Bakushin O is losing speed!<n>Has her initial energy
run dry?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Can't... keep... going... Must... slow...<n>down.

text_block_list.name: Trainers
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Sakura Bakushin O loses speed,<n>the other Umamusume
pick up their<n>pace, eventually leaving her in twelfth<n>place...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Twelfth place?! TWELFTH! What a<n>disgrace...
choice_data_list: You started out strong, too... What rotten luck.
You started out strong, too... What rotten luck.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No... Luck had nothing to do with it.<n>The others really gave
their all, and it<n>showed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Nothing screams maturity like<n>acknowledging your
opponents'<n>strength! As expected of the dignified<n>class
representative!
choice_data_list: Uh... You saying that kinda ruins it...
Uh... You saying that kinda ruins it...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, there she is. Sakura Bakushin O!<n>I'd like to have a word
with you.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Would those words happen to be<n>"I'm here to scout you"?!
I was<n>wondering when you'd show up!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
W-well, that certainly saves me some<n>time. You may not
have won today, but<n>your speed really impressed me. I'd<n>
love to take you under my wing.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
I know you've got what it takes to<n>dominate every
short-distance race<n>out there! Together, we'll make you<n>
the best sprinter in the world!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: That's right! I'll be the best—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huh? Sprinter?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That's right... Is there a problem?<n>Judging from that race,
you're clearly<n>suited to shorter distances...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I see, I see... Shorter distances, yes...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Apologies, but I must decline! Thank<n>you for your interest in
the trainer<n>position! Now... go back from whence<n>you
came!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Huh?! B-but...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Taken aback by her vehement<n>dismissal, the trainer stands
there for<n>a moment, before eventually shuffling<n>away.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Sigh... What a disappointment, butoh well! When one door closes,another is sure to open!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now then... What about you? You'veseen what I can do, so surely youhave something you'd like to say!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Or... Are you going to try to recruit me<n>as a sprinter too?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If you have to think about it, then we<n>both know the answer!
As much as I<n>hate to do this, it's going to be a no<n>from
me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, but I refuse to be limited to<n>just sprints! NO WAY,
NO HOW!
choice_data_list: Why are you so hung up on this?
Why are you so hung up on this?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Because I am class representative!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now I have a question for YOU! Can<n>you name all the G1
races that<n>AREN'T sprints? Go!
choice_data_list:
Uh, the Japanese Derby, Tenno Sho, Arima
Kinen—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: STOP! Starting to get the picture?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There's loads and LOADS of races<n>out there! And I want to
win all of<n>them, not just the short-distance<n>ones!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Remember what I said the other day?<n>I exist to be class
representative, and<n>the class representative role exists<n>for
me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I want to be a model for ALL students<n>to look up to!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And what type of runner do you think<n>of when you hear
that?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
A sprinter? A miler? A stayer? No,<n>you don't think of just
one. You think<n>of a runner who can do it all!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And THAT is the kind of runner the<n>class representative
should be!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So if you'll excuse me, I have places<n>to go, people to see!
Bakushin!<n>Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Before I can manage to fumble<n>together a response, Sakura<n>
Bakushin O is long gone...
